pkgmetadata.longdescription: # event2vec**Documentation**: [https://straymat.gitlab.io/event2vec/](https://straymat.gitlab.io/event2vec/)**Source Code**: [https://gitlab.com/strayMat/event2vec](https://gitlab.com/strayMat/event2vec)## OverviewElectronic Health Record and claims contain sequences of care: every contactbetween a patient and a healthcare system (either hospital, either insurance) isrecorded in a central database. Medical terminologies are often used to encodethe type of care : diagnoses, acts, drugs, laboratory, ...Such healthcare trajectories can be viewed as sequence of tokens, similarly tosequences of words.This package propose to use matrix factorization as a simple and efficient wayto build event embedding from a medical observational database.
